casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Perry POOLER NO. 2018-KH-1578 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 20, 2019

Denied. Applicant has previously exhausted his right to state collateral review and fails to show that any exception permits his successive filing. See State ex rel. Pooler v. State, 15-1541 (La. 9/23/16), 200 So.3d 363 .
